a noticeable hissing or bubbling sound is present around the hvac unit
sound of hissing or bubbling at the indoor unit
ac making a hissing sound
poor cooling performance
some rooms never reach setpoint
frost or ice on suction line or indoor coil

internal mechanical failure or debris in valve
valve slide leaking internally due to wear
hot_gas_bypassing_indicated_by_temperature_readings
pressures_do_not_equalize_normally_on_mode_change
rules.notes: specific=Reversing valve stuck or leaking

one or more rooms are not receiving adequate conditioning compared to the rest
some rooms never get enough heat or ac
uneven cooling in the house
some rooms not cooling/heating at all
weak airflow in distant parts of the house
high energy bills due to conditioned air loss
detached or broken duct in attic/crawlspace
large gaps or holes in ductwork from damage or poor installation
failed duct seals at plenum or register connections
noticeable_air_leaks_in_attic_or_crawlspace
significantly_imbalanced_airflow_measurements

ac making squealing noise

rules.label: dx.system_oversized_short_cycles_high_humidity
any: house is very humid
indoor humidity remains high despite cooling operation
ac isn't removing humidity
air feels clammy inside
boiler keeps turning on and off
the boiler turns on and off more frequently than normal
commercial boiler short cycling frequently
very short cooling/heating cycles system turns off after just a few minutes
house cools quickly but feels clammy or damp in summer
notable temperature swings and unit constantly turning on and off
incorrect equipment sizing during installation oversized tonnage or btus
significant improvement to home insulation or window upgrades after sizing making system effectively too large
multi-stage or modulating equipment not set up to run at lower stages
cycle_times_measured_well_below_recommended_minimum
latent_load_humidity_not_being_handled_due_to_short_run
rules.notes: auto from mapping_ids=map_0052,map_0053,map_0054,map_0085,map_0086; specific=System oversized (short cycling, humidity issues)

rules.label: dx.system_undersized_for_load_or_extreme_weather
any: hvac runs non-stop but cannot reach thermostat setting on very hot/cold days
some rooms never get comfortable because the unit cannot deliver enough cooling/heating
maybe an okay performance during moderate weather but falls behind in extreme conditions
initial design load underestimated or equipment selected too small
significant changes to the home/building addition insulation removed increasing the load
extreme weather beyond typical ranges e.g. record-breaking heat temporarily exceeding capacity
manual_j_load_calculation_indicates_higher_load_than_system_capacity
unit_running_continuously_with_indoor_temperature_not_dropping
rules.notes: specific=System undersized for load or extreme conditions

possible compressor noise liquid slugging if flooding

mechanical failure of valve components
erratic_superheat_readings
pressure_oscillations_at_txv

thermostat_located_in_atypical_environment_sunlight_etc

thermostat defaulting to an energy-saving mode that wasn’t noticed

rules.label: dx.thermostat_unresponsive_or_malfunctioning

software glitch or firmware issue in smart thermostats
